Statistics tab contains information on the global count. Either swipe to refresh the statistics or use the icon in the top right corner.
Countries tab contains a list of every country. Select a country for detailed information.
Safety tab is the safety center where precautions from COVID-19 are mentioned. As this application is developed in Pakistan, we have provided the official website and helpline for Pakistan only.
A list of precautions which should be taken against COVID-19 as there isn\'t a vaccine available yet. Ensure following steps are being taken to keep yourself and others out of risk.

Wash your hands for 20 seconds using an Anti-bacterial soap or hand wash. If outside, carry a sanitizer. Do not greet anyone when visiting anywhere. Follow Social Distancing for time-being for keeping yourself and others out of risk
Use a medical mask whenever going outside or if you are facing the symptoms of COVID-19. If you have Flu, are frequently sneezing or going through a fever, use a mask so it does not effect others
Avoid any kind of gathering, stay at least 3ft away from everyone. Don\'t roam outside due to unnecessary means. Keep yourself clean and avoid any kind of physical contact.

Stay inside your homes. Your home is your fortress against COVID-19. Avoid going outside due to unnecessary reasons. Work from home if possible and if not then take every possible precaution like medical mask, sanitizer, and gloves.

Fruits & vegetables make your immune system strong, as COVID-19 can be defeated with a strong immune system. Eat, Share, Advise Fruits & Vegetables everyday to make your immune system a powerful shield against COVID-19.
Be Kind to everyone as much as possible in this time of need. Help others as per their requirements. Take care of your elderly, love them, respect them and motivate them.
